rows.label: qst104219_msg0001
rows.name:
You lot again, eh? Always
a pleasure to see you.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm still the same as ever.
Just researching ancient
things around this village.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0003
rows.name:
I've learned so many things here. What
I'd really like is to share the wonders
of history with the locals...

rows.label: qst104219_msg0004
rows.name:
But they never seem to have time
for an old man's ramblings. Too
busy with missions and whatnot.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0005
rows.name:
Still, it's not as though I can
just toddle on back to Superbia...
So I'm in a bit of a fix.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0006
rows.name:
A job teaching history to
children? In Iyasaki Village?

rows.label: qst104219_msg0007
rows.name:
If I recall correctly, there is a rather
intriguing ancient artifact there. They
call it the "Village Guardian".

rows.label: qst104219_msg0008
rows.name:
If you would have me, I would be
most happy to take up the post.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0051
rows.name: Invite Hassane to teach in Iyasaki?

rows.label: qst104219_msg0061
rows.name: Then there's no time to lose!

rows.label: qst104219_msg0062
rows.name:
I'll see about getting together all
my things, then head straight for
Iyasaki. That sound all right?

rows.label: qst104219_msg0082
rows.name:
Perhaps the mercenary folk here
will listen to me if I just spark
their interest a little more...

rows.label: qst104219_msg0101
rows.name:
Were you still interested in
offering me that teaching position?
I'd be glad to take it up.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0151
rows.name:
So, about that history teaching
position... Ah, it has already been
filled, has it? A shame, a shame...

rows.label: qst104219_msg0201
rows.name:
But there's no real good opportunity
for that. And even if there was, I bet
someone else would've jumped on it...
